section.title: Query Manager Perspective
section.para: Query Manager Perspective composes and shows various forms of View and Editor necessary for utilizing Anyframe Query Manager, and the format is similar to the following figure.

The main components of Query Manager are as the following.
Query Explorer View: provides Query search and read for all the Eclipse project of user.
Query Results View: shows Query test result.
Query Manager Editor: writes Query mapping XML file.
Query Test Editor: adds/edits Query ID.
Connections View: sets and manages database connection as an extended function of Eclipse SQL Explorer.
Database Structure View: checks database structure as an extended function of Eclipse SQL Explorer.
You can open Query Manager Perspective of Anyframe Query Manager at "Window > Open Perspective > Other..." or "Open Perspective" icon at the top right of Eclipse window.
